image_requirements.description: These images will be used by the Store Ops teams to help locate product in stores for customers who purchase online and choose to 'Pick Up In Store'.
Yes. The image studio has been taking photos of products in packaging for the last year now, it is required.
All product categories that are sold in packaging in stores.
Packaging product shots will continue to be designated as the 1st alternate shot online – the primary shot being out of packaging and/or on model.
If updates are made to packaging, vendors must send updated imagery or packaging to shoot.

summary: The document outlines the requirements for product packaging images necessary for all apparel sold in stores. It specifies the importance of these images for store operations, confirms their necessity, and details the required categories, shot designations, and update protocols.
